name: part_002
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア生誕祭LIVE】遅れてやってきた私の誕生日LIVE！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [H1vf2vF1LmE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene and Shiranui Flare perform the song 'Kami-sama wa Erekishubeni'.
Transition with a black screen and then a title card for Shiranui Flare Birthday Live 2022.
MC section where Flare and Nene talk about their performance and their friendship.

subtitles.original: …この星の秘密を知りたがる
subtitles.english: ...wanting to know the secrets of this planet

subtitles.original: 出汁麺つめただけの地殻
subtitles.english: The crust made of only chilled dashi noodles

subtitles.original: エアコン切れてただけの氷河期
subtitles.english: The ice age caused by a turned-off air conditioner

subtitles.original: 恐竜の化石は趣味のプラモ
subtitles.english: Dinosaur fossils are just hobby plastic models

subtitles.original: とか気づかないで
subtitles.english: Don't notice that

subtitles.original: ブレーカー落ちてる間にマンモス滅んだ
subtitles.english: The mammoths went extinct while the breaker was down

subtitles.original: これぞ御電化 惑星の理屈
subtitles.english: That's electrification—the logic of the planet

subtitles.original: 金星の神から輸入してた
subtitles.english: Imported from the God of Venus

subtitles.original: 電気代値上がりしたからケチってたんだ
subtitles.english: They were being stingy because the electricity bill went up

subtitles.original: このペースだとあと数年で
subtitles.english: At this rate, in a few years

subtitles.original: 予算を使い切りそう
subtitles.english: the budget will run out

subtitles.original: どうやって埋めましょ
subtitles.english: How should we fill it?

subtitles.original: どうやって埋めましょ
subtitles.english: How should we fill it?

subtitles.original: 予算があれば地軸は真っ直ぐにできたし
subtitles.english: If we had the budget, the Earth's axis could have been straight

subtitles.original: 完璧な生き物にもできたんだ でもケチ
subtitles.english: And we could have made perfect creatures, but we're stingy

subtitles.original: 地軸の傾きは四季を産んで
subtitles.english: The tilt of the Earth's axis gave birth to the four seasons

subtitles.original: 不完全な心は愛を産んだ 案外いい星になった
subtitles.english: And the imperfect heart gave birth to love—it turned out to be a pretty good planet

subtitles.original: でももう無理こんなクソ星捨てるわ
subtitles.english: But it's no use, I'm throwing this crappy planet away

subtitles.original: そのお金で天国の個室買う
subtitles.english: And buying a private room in heaven with that money

subtitles.original: あとはせいぜい上手く歩めよ人共
subtitles.english: The rest of you humans, try your best to walk well

subtitles.original: 私なしじゃすぐ死ぬだろうけど
subtitles.english: Though you'll probably die soon without me

subtitles.original: せっかくだし最後に悠久でも取って
subtitles.english: Since I'm at it, I'll take an eternity's worth of leave at the end

subtitles.original: 温泉に行くことにするかな
subtitles.english: And decide to go to an onsen

subtitles.original: おたのしみにー！
subtitles.english: Enjoy!

subtitles.original: はぁー、はぁー。
subtitles.english: Haa, haa.

subtitles.original: お湯、良かったねー！
subtitles.english: The bath was great, wasn't it!

subtitles.original: いい湯だったー。いやー、ご飯美味しかったー。
subtitles.english: It was a good bath. Man, the food was delicious.

subtitles.original: ねえ、最高だったー。ねー。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it was the best. Right?

subtitles.original: いやー、なんか、ねねちとはさ、なんか、
subtitles.english: Man, you know, with Nene-chi, we go out for meals

subtitles.original: ご飯とか裏ではね、結構行ったりとか、そう、しているんだけど。
subtitles.english: and stuff behind the scenes quite often.

subtitles.original: うんうん。
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: 温泉は初めてだね、じゃなくて。
subtitles.english: This is the first time we've been to an onsen... wait, no.

subtitles.original: ま、それは置いといて。今日ね、来てくれてどうもありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Well, setting that aside. Thank you so much for coming today.

subtitles.original: いや、こちらこそ！ふーたん、お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: No, the pleasure is mine! Fuu-tan, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: いや、なんかさ、ねねちとはコラボとかは、実は二人で、とかはないんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Well, you know, we haven't actually done a collab just the two of us, have we?

subtitles.original: おー、確かに確かに。
subtitles.english: Oh, you're right, you're right.

subtitles.original: そう、なんかゴールデンウィークとかにさ、
subtitles.english: Yeah, like during Golden Week, we got all hyped up

subtitles.original: 一緒になってゲーム盛り上がったりとかね、頑張ったりとか、したけどさ。
subtitles.english: playing games together and worked hard and stuff.

subtitles.original: ねえ、楽しかったよね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, that was fun.

subtitles.original: そう、だから二人で何かするっていうの、ずっと実は、やってみたいなって思ってたんだよね。
subtitles.english: So, I'd actually been wanting to do something just the two of us for a long time.

subtitles.original: えー、何それー！嬉しいんだけどー！ねねちー！
subtitles.english: Eh, what's that! I'm so happy! Nene-chi!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい、嬉しい、嬉しい。
subtitles.english: So happy, so happy, so happy.

subtitles.original: で、それで、なんかねねちってさ、
subtitles.english: And then, I heard that Nene-chi can hit

subtitles.original: 結構なんか高いのとかも出るってさ、聞いたからさ。
subtitles.english: quite high notes too.

subtitles.original: 歌枠とかもさ、めちゃめちゃ高いのとか出るからさ、
subtitles.english: You hit really high notes in your singing streams too,

subtitles.original: この歌を、あの、実は、歌いたいと思ってたんだけど。
subtitles.english: so I'd actually been wanting to sing this song...

subtitles.original: 歌えるのもう、ねねちしかいないんじゃないかと思って、ねねちにさ。
subtitles.english: I thought Nene-chi might be the only one who could sing it, so I asked her.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ合ってるじゃん。ちょっとさ、ねねちとは普通の曲じゃなくて、
subtitles.english: It suits you so well. I wanted to sing something a bit interesting

subtitles.original: なんかちょっと面白い、かつ、なんか好きな曲、歌いたいなと思ってて。
subtitles.english: and a song I like with Nene-chi, rather than just a normal song.

subtitles.original: 確か、確かに。
subtitles.english: True, true.

subtitles.original: いや、もうねねちにぴったりじゃんって思ってたんだよね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, I thought it was just perfect for Nene-chi.

subtitles.original: いや、ねね、この曲、あのふーたんに教えてもらって初めて、あの覚えたんだけど。
subtitles.english: Well, I only learned this song for the first time after Fuu-tan told me about it.

subtitles.original: いや、本当なんか不思議な曲だし、でも楽しくて。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's really a strange song, but it's fun.

subtitles.original: いや、でも高いわ。
subtitles.english: But man, it's high.

subtitles.original: いや、でもね、本当ありがとう。すごかったよ。
subtitles.english: No, but seriously, thank you. You were amazing.

subtitles.original: いや、うちら声の相性めっちゃ良くない？
subtitles.english: Hey, don't our voices go really well together?

subtitles.original: ある、それは本当、また一緒に歌おうよ。
subtitles.english: They do, they really do. Let's sing together again.

subtitles.original: ねえ、歌いたい歌いたい。
subtitles.english: Yeah, I want to, I want to.

subtitles.original: ねえ、今めちゃめちゃ疲れてると思うけど、ちょっとめちゃめちゃさ、ちょっと頑張ったから。
subtitles.english: Yeah, I bet you're exhausted right now, because we really put in a lot of effort.

subtitles.original: いや、本当ありがとう。リハとかも大変だったけどさ。
subtitles.english: No, thank you so much. Rehearsals were tough too.

subtitles.original: いや、本当、歌だけと言わず、あの、これからも、ゲームもよろしくお願いますよ。
subtitles.english: Seriously, not just singing, please keep playing games with me too from now on.

subtitles.original: ちょっと、最後に写真撮ろう、写真。
subtitles.english: Let's take a photo at the end, a photo.

subtitles.original: あ、撮る撮る撮る撮る。
subtitles.english: Oh, let's take it, let's take it.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！ピース、ハピバハピバ。
subtitles.english: Yay! Peace, happy birthday, happy birthday.

subtitles.original: ハッピーイエーイ！ありがとう、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Happy yay! Thank you, thank you!
